properties.Name: CreditorPayment
properties.Description: A payment by the creditor against the workout schedule.

Columns.Name: WorkoutProceedingId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Workout Proceeding.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date for the associated payment.

Columns.Name: PaymentByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party making the payment.

Columns.Name: PaymentNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the payment.

Columns.Name: PaymentStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a payment status.
